movies.title: Gone with the Wind
movies.plot: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman's destructive "March to the Sea,‚Äù during the American Civil War.

events.title: using her new husband's money, Scarlet O'Hara writes a cheque to pay off the tax collector
